abstract: Ron Conway, one of Silicon Valley’s most prolific investors, has invested in hundreds of technology companies, including Twitter and Google. DealBook is live blogging his discussion at the TechCrunch Disrupt conference.
snippet: Ron Conway, one of Silicon Valley’s most prolific investors, has invested in hundreds of technology companies, including Twitter and Google. DealBook is live blogging his discussion at the TechCrunch Disrupt conference.
lead_paragraph: Ron Conway, one of Silicon Valley’s most prolific investors, has invested in hundreds of technology companies over the past 15 years, including Twitter and Google. He spoke at the TechCrunch Disrupt conference on what makes great entrepreneurs stand out. DealBook’s Evelyn Rusli was at the conference and what follows is her live blog of the event.

headline.main: Blogging the TechCrunch Disrupt Conference: Ron Conway
